title: Define Business Problem and Objectives
description: Clearly articulate the business problem focusing on health challenges in South Africa. Define main objectives including identifying health risk zones, analyzing healthcare access, and linking hygiene to disease outcomes.

title: Identify Stakeholders and Requirements
description: Document key stakeholders including SA Department of Health, provincial authorities, NGOs like UNICEF and WHO. Define their specific requirements and expectations from the HDPSA project analysis.

title: Establish Success Criteria and KPIs
description: Define measurable success criteria for the HDPSA project. Establish key performance indicators and metrics that will determine project success and impact assessment.

title: Document Assumptions, Risks, and Constraints
description: Identify and document project assumptions about data quality, representativeness, and methodology. Assess risks including missing data, sampling bias, and resource constraints.

title: Explore Healthcare Access Dataset
description: Conduct comprehensive exploration of Access to Health Care dataset including variables like distance to facilities, travel time, facility types, and provider density. Document data structure and quality issues.

title: Analyze Child and Maternal Mortality Datasets
description: Explore Child Mortality and Maternal Mortality datasets. Examine mortality rates, patterns across provinces, and relationships with socioeconomic factors. Document data quality and missing values.

title: Examine Water and Sanitation Infrastructure Data
description: Analyze Water and Toilet Facilities datasets to understand access patterns, infrastructure quality, and regional disparities. Focus on improved vs unimproved access and distance factors.

title: Investigate Health Behavior Patterns
description: Explore HIV Behavior, Immunization, and COVID-19 Prevention datasets. Analyze behavioral patterns, vaccination coverage, and health compliance across different demographics and regions.

title: Analyze Nutrition and Child Health Indicators
description: Examine Anthropometry, ARI Symptoms, and IYCF datasets focusing on child nutrition, stunting, wasting, feeding practices, and respiratory health patterns across provinces.

title: Assess Literacy and Education Patterns
description: Explore Literacy dataset examining overall, male, and female literacy rates. Analyze education patterns across provinces and potential correlations with health outcomes.

title: Create Comprehensive Data Dictionary
description: Develop detailed data dictionary documenting all variables across 12 datasets including definitions, data types, value ranges, missing value patterns, and data quality assessments.

title: Generate Preliminary Visualizations Dashboard
description: Create preliminary dashboard using Power BI showing key insights from all datasets. Include interactive visualizations for stakeholder review and initial pattern identification.
